title: Application Features
text:
Key features of this application:

- Hypercard-style navigation
- Card stacking interface
- Simple markdown-like syntax
- Browser history integration

This repository also contains many interactive visualizations and tools:

Browse by category:
- [[HTML_Files]] - Interactive visualizations
- [[JavaScript_Files]] - Supporting scripts
- [[CSS_Files]] - Style sheets
- [[Markdown_Files]] - Documentation

Repository Index:
- [[RepoIndex]] - Complete file listing

Try the 4D Simulation for an example of the repository's capabilities.
